Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run home run in the ninth inning to put the Mets ahead 3-2, and they eventually won 4-2.
Pre-Game Insights: Mets manager Carlos Mendoza predicted that Pete Alonso would hit a big home run in his postgame interview after the Mets' Game 2 loss.
Post-Match Reflections: Mendoza expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets were down 2-0 in the ninth inning but came back to win 4-2.
The Mets will now face the Philadelphia Phillies in the NL Division Series starting Saturday.
Others: The Mets had a renewed sense of belief after a slew of roster changes, and they were equipped with a new anthem, 'OMG!'.
